text: MA Mobin is a Bangladeshi cinematographer and photographer. In 1977, he won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Cinematography for the film Simana Periye. ==Selected films== * Dhire Bohe Meghna - 1973 * Bichar - 1974 * Shimana Periye - 1977 * Janani - 1977 * Shurjokonna - 1977 * Lal Shobujer Pala - 1981 * Devdas - 1982 * Rajlakshmi Srikanta 1987 * Shonkhonil Karagar - 1992 * Dipu Number Two 1996 * Dukhai - 1997 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !!
